newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria sells 46.454 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria sells 46.454 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry on Tuesday sold two discount T-bill issues with maturities of one week and four weeks, yielding 3.77 percent and 17.55 percent to maturity, respectively, the central bank said.
Bids were received for a total of 49.329 billion levs of T-bills but the ministry approved bids for 46.454 billion levs worth of paper.
The issues were offered with no par value or minimum acceptable price set in advance by the ministry. Auction date and maturity date for each issue overlap.
Details of the issues follow. Prices in percent of par:
Bids received 32,811.5 million levs 16,517.6 million levs
Bids approved 30,826.5 million levs 15,627.6 million levs
Avg yield to maturity 3.77 pct 17.55 pct
